Keywords: Celebrity , Fantastic Four
Real Name: Jennifer Walters
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: This character can move through Blocking terrain. Immediately after movement resolves, destroy all Blocking terrain moved through.
THE FANTASTIC FOUR FOR FOUR MINUTES: Once per turn, you may reroll an attack roll that has a 4.

February 25, 2021
Jarosa
I love pieces that destroy blocking terrain when they move, especially paired with charge. She has great longevity for 75 points and is a threat on all 9 clicks. Great She Hulk representation.

February 20, 2021
KillerKing
The power common of the set. Classic bruiser for 75 points. If you don't have access to higher rarity figures this is a good one to pick.
February 11, 2021
Goop
Basic bruiser attacker. I like she's got great atk/dmg values her whole dial with perplex at the end. On the right map to take advantage of busting through walls she is quite good. The reroll on 4 regardless of lof/range is another great bonus.
